entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
